part_description: Contains ten evenly spaced horizontal drawers, stacked vertically.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the cabinet frame, supported by internal tracks. Drawers are aligned to maintain balance and structural integrity, allowing for efficient storage and access.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with users who open and close drawers to store or retrieve items. Can be placed against walls or in closets, providing organized storage solutions in homes or offices.
